scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && npm run build-next && firebase deploy
scripts.build-next: cd 'src/app' && npm i && npm run build
scripts.deps-copy: cp -R 'src/app/static' 'dist/functions' && cp 'src/app/package.json' 'dist/functions' && cp -R src/functions dist/ && cp -R src/public dist/
scripts.test: cd src/app && npm i && npm run test
